It was 
http://www.shaolin-society.co.uk/shaolin_legacy/history.php?history=13
but PUHLEEZE note that the material there was a direct steal from the samurai-archives.com website (from Oda Nobunaga downwards):
http://www.samurai-archives.com/

I would appreciate people doing a little research of their own with google before appealing to the list...

Regards,
Barry Thomas
PS: and signing off politely...
